about.title: About TopicsFlow - The Future of Discussion
about.metaDescription: TopicsFlow is a modern Reddit-style discussion platform with real-time chat rooms.
about.heroSubtitle: Where conversations flow naturally. A real-time community platform for modern discussions.

discover.label: Discover the Platform
discover.title: Redefining Online Communities
discover.description: TopicsFlow isn't just another forum. It's a cohesive ecosystem where Reddit-style structured discussions meet the immediacy of real-time chat rooms. We've built a space where you can dive deep into long-form content or hang out in live channels, all with a seamless, modern interface.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: TopicsFlow is a hybrid platform combining the best of structured forums and real-time chat. It allows you to create focused topics for long-term discussions while also providing immediate, live chat rooms for community bonding.
faq.q2: How do I create a new topic?
faq.a2: Simply click the 'Create Topic' button in the sidebar. You can customize it with a title, description, and tags. You can also choose if it's public or invite-only, and if anonymous posting is allowed.
faq.a3: Yes! TopicsFlow is completely free for all users. You can create topics, join chats, and share files without any cost.
faq.a4: Absolutely. Many topics allow 'Anonymous Mode', letting you participate without revealing your main profile. You can even set a custom alias for each topic.
faq.a5: Topic owners can appoint moderators. Moderators have tools to delete messages, ban users, and manage requests. We also have a built-in reporting system for safety.

publications.title: Dynamic Publications
publications.shortDesc: Community forums for deep dives and organized discussion.
publications.longDesc: Reddit-inspired spaces where you can share ideas, vote on content, and keep long-form discussions organized within specialized Topics. Our publication system supports rich text, media embeds, and threaded comments for meaningful engagement.

chat.title: Real-time Group Chat
chat.shortDesc: Instant social hubs for every discussion topic.
chat.longDesc: Instant messaging rooms paired with every forum topic. Experience fluid conversations with typing indicators, presence tracking, and real-time reactions that bring your community to life.

voip.title: High-Quality VOIP
voip.shortDesc: Crystal clear voice rooms integrated into chats.
voip.longDesc: Seamless voice communication integrated directly into your chat rooms. Join or leave calls with a single click, track active speakers, and enjoy low-latency audio for a truly collaborative experience.

anonymous.title: Advanced Privacy
anonymous.shortDesc: Engage freely with per-topic unique identities.
anonymous.longDesc: A unique identity system where you can choose a custom alias for each topic. This protects your main profile while allowing you to stay active in sensitive or private discussions without compromise.

multimedia.title: Multimedia Richness
multimedia.shortDesc: Share high-res images, videos, and GIFs easily.
multimedia.longDesc: Express yourself fully with support for high-resolution images, optimized video playback, and built-in Tenor GIF search. Our secure storage ensures your media is always accessible and safe.

support.title: Professional Support
support.shortDesc: Integrated ticket system for direct assistance.
support.longDesc: A professional helpdesk platform where you can report bugs, request help, or reach out to the moderation team. Track the status of your requests in real-time with direct feedback from admins.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.shortDesc: Stay updated with real-time community alerts.
notifications.longDesc: Never miss a beat with real-time desktop and in-app alerts. Get notified of mentions, direct messages, topic invitations, and active discussions that matter most to you.

security.title: Unmatched Security
security.longDesc: Industry-standard TOTP authentication (2FA) compatible with Google and Microsoft Authenticator. Includes account recovery systems and backup codes to ensure you never lose access to your data.
